sense.def:
To be conscious of something
pomeni nekaj opaziti ali se tistega zavedati.

seg.quote: She became conscious of Rudolph looking at her.
I was conscious that he had changed his tactics.

sense.def:
Besedo
conscious
uporabljamo v izrazih, kot je
socially conscious
in
politically conscious
, da opišemo človeka, ki je prepričan, da je določeni vidik življenja pomemben.

seg.quote: Hundreds of women had become politically conscious.

sense.def:
Dejanje ali napor, ki je
conscious
, je storjen namenoma.

seg.quote: He made a conscious effort to look pleased.
She couldn't believe that Mr Foster would ever consciously torment her.

sense.def:
Kdor je
conscious
, je buden, pri zavesti in ne spi.

seg.quote: The patient was fully conscious during the operation.
